author: jaz
msg: added updated version of minerva much better logging/tracing; added spy option to record queries as they are sent to the JDBC driver; now uses Java 1.5 concurent classes instead of oswego; removed old jar

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1263.  Change DFSClient to retry certain namenode calls with an exponential backoff.  Contributed by Hairong.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1184.  Fix HDFS decommissioning to complete when the only copy of a block is on a decomissioned node.
